briefTitle: Non-inferiority Study of Safety and Efficacy of Everolimus With Low Dose Tacrolimus to Mycophenolate Mofetil With Standard Dose Tacrolimus in Kidney Transplant Recipients
officialTitle: A 12 Month, Multi-center, Randomized, Open-label Non-inferiority Study Comparing Safety and Efficacy of Concentration-controlled Everolimus With Low Dose Tacrolimus to Mycophenolate Mofetil With Standard Dose Tacrolimus in de Novo Renal Transplant Recipients
summary: The purpose of this phase 3b study is to compare the safety and efficacy of everolimus with low dose tacrolimus to mycophenolate mofetil with standard dose tacrolimus in kidney transplant recipients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Incidence of Composite Efficacy Failure

effectByArm.arm: Mycophenolate Mofetil and Standard Dose Tacrolimus
